doc:
Charley Chase https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charley_Chase 0 Charley Chase (born Charles Joseph Parrott, October 20, 1893 – June 20, 1940) was an American comedian, actor, screenwriter and film director best known for his work in Hal Roach short film comedies. He was the older brother of comedian/director James Parrott. Charley_Chase ( born Charles_Joseph_Parrott , October_20_,_1893 – June_20_,_1940 ) was an_American_comedian , actor_,_screenwriter_and_film_director best known for his_work in Hal_Roach_short_film_comedies . He was the_older_brother of comedian/director_James_Parrott .
